beforeAfter.title: The ElevAIte Transformation: Before & After
beforeAfter.subtitle: Select a department to see how our custom AI agents outperform traditional tools and boost your operational efficiency.

s1.beforeDescription: Reps spend 3+ hours googling basic info, missing 90% of decision triggers and critical buying signals.
s1.afterDescription: Our AI performs deep-dive research in minutes, finding executive moves, funding rounds, and 'why now' moments.

s2.beforeDescription: 80% of leads go cold after just 3 touches due to forgotten context and inconsistent messaging.
s2.afterDescription: Automated 15-touch sequences with perfect recall nurture deals for 6+ months without human intervention.

s3.beforeDescription: Reps often miss key objections and competitive intel during live calls, putting important deals at risk.
s3.afterDescription: Get live battle cards and proven objection responses whispered in your ear during every single sales call.

s4.beforeDescription: Manual pipeline management leads to stalled deals and quarterly reviews when it is already too late to act.
s4.afterDescription: Receive instant alerts when prospects visit pricing pages, with automated next-action suggestions.

s5.beforeDescription: Your reps spend more time researching prospects on multiple platforms than actually talking to them.
s5.afterDescription: The agent instantly enriches all your leads with company data, social profiles, and other key insights.

m1.beforeDescription: Marketers research audiences for hours, missing 90% of micro-segments and high-intent buyer signals.
m1.afterDescription: AI identifies and targets hyper-specific segments with the most relevant messaging for higher conversion potential.

m2.beforeDescription: Campaigns targeting wide segments result in very low conversion rates and significantly wasted ad spend.
m2.afterDescription: Our AI continuously optimizes your campaigns across all channels, maximizing ROI while minimizing ad spend.

m3.beforeDescription: Content teams struggle with deadlines, producing generic copy for ads, emails, and social media posts.
m3.afterDescription: Generate high-quality first drafts for copy, email campaigns, and social media posts in seconds with brand consistency.

m4.beforeDescription: It's nearly impossible to know which marketing activities are actually driving revenue and generating ROI.
m4.afterDescription: Track every touchpoint with AI-powered attribution models that provide a clear, real-time view of marketing ROI.

m5.beforeDescription: All users receive the same email drip campaign, regardless of their specific behavior or engagement level.
m5.afterDescription: AI triggers unique email journeys that adapt in real-time based on individual user actions and engagement.

o1.beforeDescription: Teams waste hours on repetitive tasks, manual data entry, and disconnected workflows that slow business velocity.
o1.afterDescription: AI orchestrates complex workflows across multiple systems, eliminating manual handoffs and accelerating business velocity.

o2.beforeDescription: Critical business data trapped in disconnected systems makes real-time decision-making nearly impossible.
o2.afterDescription: AI provides instant insights into performance bottlenecks and opportunities with unified data visibility across all systems.

o3.beforeDescription: Poor visibility into capacity, utilization, and performance metrics leads to inefficient resource allocation.
o3.afterDescription: AI forecasts demand patterns and optimizes resource allocation to maximize efficiency and minimize waste.

o4.beforeDescription: Manual auditing and quality checks result in errors, delays, and potential regulatory compliance risks.
o4.afterDescription: AI ensures continuous quality control and regulatory adherence with automated auditing and real-time alerts.

o5.beforeDescription: Assigning tasks and resources manually often leads to unbalanced workloads and critical project delays.
o5.afterDescription: Intelligently assign all your resources based on availability, skill, and priority for maximum efficiency.

su1.beforeDescription: Customers are left waiting for hours or even days to get answers to their simple and common questions.
su1.afterTitle: Instant L1 Support with 24/7 AI Agents
su1.afterDescription: Provide immediate and accurate answers to common questions around the clock, drastically reducing wait times.

su2.beforeDescription: Your support agents spend most of their day answering the same questions and inquiries over and over again.
su2.afterDescription: The AI frees up human agents by instantly handling routine inquiries, letting them focus on complex cases.

su3.beforeDescription: Every customer gets a generic, scripted response that completely fails to acknowledge their past history.
su3.afterDescription: Our AI agent has full context of a customer's history to provide a truly personal and effective response.

su4.beforeDescription: Your team only helps customers after they complain, missing great opportunities to build loyalty and prevent churn.
su4.afterDescription: Our AI can detect signs of customer frustration or other potential issues and proactively offer effective help.

su5.beforeDescription: Your global customers are unable to get the help they need outside of your local business operating hours.
su5.afterDescription: Offer consistent, high-quality support to all of your customers, no matter their current location or time zone.

h1.beforeDescription: HR managers spend countless hours of their time reading through hundreds of mostly irrelevant resumes.
h1.afterDescription: Your AI agent will automatically screen, score, and shortlist the most qualified candidates for any open role.

h2.beforeDescription: The back-and-forth emails just to schedule a single interview with a candidate can take multiple days.
h2.afterDescription: The AI agent coordinates with candidates and interviewers to find the perfect time and books it automatically.

h3.beforeDescription: New hires receive a standard information package that doesn't cater to their specific role or needs.
h3.afterDescription: Create unique onboarding experiences for every new hire with an AI agent that guides them through their tasks.

h4.beforeDescription: HR staff are constantly interrupted with the same questions about policies, payroll, and company benefits.
h4.afterDescription: An internal AI assistant provides instant, accurate answers to all common employee questions 24/7.

h5.beforeDescription: Annual surveys provide stale data that is very difficult to act upon in a timely and effective manner.
h5.afterDescription: AI analyzes employee feedback from multiple channels in real-time to provide a constant pulse on team morale.

whyElevaite.title: The ElevAIte Launchpad: Your Journey to Automation
whyElevaite.subtitle: Our Crafted Approach

s1.title: Understanding Your Needs
s1.subtitle: Discovery & Strategic Alignment
s1.description: We start with a deep dive into your unique business processes, challenges, and strategic goals. This collaborative discovery phase is crucial for ensuring your AI solution is perfectly aligned with your vision and delivers maximum impact.

s2.title: Crafting Your Custom AI
s2.subtitle: Tailored Development & Design
s2.description: Our experts design and build your AI agents from the ground up, integrating sophisticated logic and custom workflows. We don't use off-the-shelf templates; this is about tailor-made intelligence specifically for your operational demands.

s3.title: Onboarding & Training
s3.subtitle: Empowering Your Team for Success
s3.description: We don't just hand over the technology. We provide comprehensive onboarding for your team to ensure everyone knows how to leverage the new AI agents effectively and track their performance from day one.

s4.title: Boosting Your Performance
s4.subtitle: Integration & Impact
s4.description: The final step is seamlessly integrating the AI into your environment and measuring its impact. We ensure a smooth launch and provide ongoing support to maximize your ROI and drive continuous improvement.

s5.title: Optimization & Scaling
s5.subtitle: A Partnership for Continuous Growth
s5.description: Our partnership extends beyond launch. We continuously monitor your AI agents' performance, providing optimizations and strategic recommendations to ensure your solutions scale seamlessly as your business grows.

integrationsComponent.description: ElevAIte's AI agents are designed to operate at the heart of your existing tools. We natively integrate with your CRMs, communication platforms, calendars, and more, amplifying your workflows without disruption and boosting overall productivity.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find quick answers to common questions about our AI solutions.

q1.question: What kind of AI agents can you build?
q1.answer: We craft a wide range of AI agents tailored to specific business needs, including marketing agents, automation agents for operational tasks, intelligent receptionist agents, sales AI assistants to boost your pipeline, AI-powered support agents for enhanced customer experience, and data analyst agents for insightful reporting.

q2.question: How long does it take to implement a custom AI agent?
q2.answer: The timeline for implementing a custom AI agent can vary depending on the complexity and the integration requirements. Typically, a project can take anywhere from a few weeks to a couple of months. We begin with a discovery phase to fully understand your specific needs and then provide you with a more accurate project estimate.

q3.question: Do your AI agents integrate with existing business tools?
q3.answer: Absolutely. Seamless integration is a core part of our offering. Our AI agents are designed to connect with your existing CRMs (like Salesforce, HubSpot), communication platforms (Slack, email, Teams), calendar tools, databases, and even custom APIs to ensure a smooth workflow.

q4.question: How do you ensure the AI solutions are truly 'crafted' for my business?
q4.answer: Our process begins with a deep dive into your specific operational challenges, workflows, and strategic goals. We don't use one-size-fits-all templates. Each AI agent's logic, tasks, and integrations are custom-designed and developed to provide a truly personalized solution that addresses your unique requirements.

q5.question: What kind of ROI can I expect from an AI agent?
q5.answer: Clients typically see significant ROI through increased efficiency, reduced manual labor costs, improved lead conversion rates, faster response times, and enhanced customer satisfaction. We work with you to define key performance indicators (KPIs) to measure the specific impact on your business.

finalCta.description: Ready to unlock unprecedented efficiency and scale with AI agents built for your unique business needs? Let's build your future, together.

body.p1: This Privacy Policy describes how ElevAIte Labs AG ("ElevAIte", "we", "us", or "our") collects, uses, processes, and discloses your information in connection with your access to and use of our website (elevaitelabs.io), our AI-powered services, and other interactions you may have with us (collectively, the "Services").
body.p2: We are committed to protecting your privacy and handling your data in an open and transparent manner. When you access our Website or use our Services, you are trusting us with your information. We understand this is a big responsibility and we work hard to protect your information and put you in control.

body.p1: We collect information to provide better services to all our users. The types of personal information we may collect depend on your interaction with us and can be broadly categorized as follows:
body.h4_1: A. Information You Provide to Us
body.p2: This includes data you voluntarily provide when you create an account, request a demo, contact our sales or support teams, or otherwise communicate with us. This may include your full name, email address, phone number, company name, job title, and the content of your communications.
body.p3: When you navigate our Website or use our Services, we may collect certain information automatically from your device. This includes your IP address, device type, browser type, operating system, unique device identifiers, and broad geographic location. We also collect information about how your device has interacted with our Website, including the pages accessed and links clicked. We use tools like Google Analytics 4 (GA4) for this purpose. For more details, please see our Cookie Policy.

body.p1: We use the information we collect for various business purposes, including to:
body.li1_strong: Provide, Operate, and Maintain our Services:
body.li1_text: To set up and manage your account, process transactions, and provide you with the AI agent services you request.
body.li2_strong: Improve, Personalize, and Expand our Services:
body.li2_text: To understand and analyze how you use our Services and to develop new products, services, features, and functionality.
body.li3_text: To send you transactional messages, technical notices, updates, security alerts, and support messages. We may also send you marketing communications (in accordance with your preferences) about our products and services.
body.li4_text: To detect and prevent fraudulent activities, abuse, and other harmful activities to protect you, our other customers, and ourselves.
body.li5_text: To comply with applicable legal requirements, such as tax and accounting obligations, and to respond to lawful requests by public authorities.

body.p1: We do not sell your personal data. We may share your information with third parties who provide services on our behalf, but only in the following circumstances:
body.li1_text: We work with third-party service providers to support our business operations, such as cloud hosting (e.g., Vercel, AWS), CRM platforms, analytics providers, and payment processors. These providers only have access to the information necessary to perform their functions and are contractually obligated to protect it.
body.li2_text: We may disclose your information if we believe it is required by applicable law, regulation, legal process, or governmental request.
body.li3_text: In connection with any merger, sale of company assets, financing, or acquisition of all or a portion of our business by another company.

body.p1: We will retain your personal information only for as long as is necessary for the purposes set out in this Privacy Policy. We will retain and use your information to the extent necessary to comply with our legal obligations (for example, if we are required to retain your data to comply with applicable laws), resolve disputes, and enforce our legal agreements and policies. Once the data is no longer needed for these purposes, it is securely deleted or anonymized.
Depending on your location, you may have the following rights regarding your personal data:
body.li1_text3: the information we have on you.
body.li2_text2: if that information is inaccurate or incomplete.
body.li3_text2: to our processing of your personal data.
body.li4_text1: The right to request that we
body.li4_text2: the processing of your personal information.
body.li5_text2: , allowing you to be provided with a copy of your information in a structured, machine-readable format.
body.li6_text2: at any time where we relied on your consent to process your information.

body.p1: If you have any questions, concerns, or comments about this Privacy Policy or our data practices, please do not hesitate to contact us. You can reach our privacy team by emailing:

These Terms and Conditions constitute a legally binding agreement made between you, whether personally or on behalf of an entity (‚Äúyou‚Äù) and ElevAIte Labs AG (‚Äúwe,‚Äù ‚Äúus,‚Äù or ‚Äúour‚Äù), concerning your access to and use of our AI agent services and the elevaitelabs.io website (collectively, the ‚ÄúServices‚Äù).
body.p2: You agree that by accessing the Services, you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by all of these Terms and Conditions. IF YOU DO NOT AGREE WITH ALL OF THESE TERMS, THEN YOU ARE EXPRESSLY PROHIBITED FROM USING THE SERVICES AND YOU MUST DISCONTINUE USE IMMEDIATELY.
body.p3: Supplemental terms and conditions or documents that may be posted on the Website from time to time are hereby expressly incorporated herein by reference.

body.p1: ElevAIte Labs provides custom-built, AI-powered agents designed to automate and optimize business processes, including but not limited to sales, marketing, operations, and customer support. The specific functionalities, scope, and performance metrics of each AI agent are defined in the specific service plan and setup agreement (‚ÄúService Plan‚Äù) you subscribe to. The Service is provided on a subscription basis and may include a one-time setup fee.

To use certain features of the Service, you may be required to create an account. You are responsible for safeguarding your account password and for any activities or actions under your account. You agree to provide and maintain true, accurate, current, and complete information about yourself as prompted by the service's registration form.
body.p2: You are also responsible for providing the necessary data, access to third-party systems (e.g., CRMs), and strategic guidance required for us to build and maintain your AI agents as outlined in your Service Plan. You retain all ownership rights to your underlying data.

body.p1: You may not access or use the Services for any purpose other than that for which we make the Services available. The Services may not be used in connection with any commercial endeavors except those that are specifically endorsed or approved by us. As a user of the Services, you agree not to:
body.li1: Use the AI agents for any illegal, harmful, or fraudulent activities.
body.li2: Attempt to reverse-engineer, decompile, or otherwise discover the source code or underlying algorithms of the AI agents.
body.li3: Interfere with, disrupt, or create an undue burden on the Services or the networks or services connected to them.
body.li4: Use any data provided by the Service for purposes other than your internal business operations as intended by your Service Plan.

body.p1: We offer various subscription plans as detailed on our Pricing Page. You agree to pay all fees, including any applicable one-time setup fees, in accordance with the terms of your selected Service Plan. Subscription fees are billed on a recurring basis (e.g., monthly or annually) in advance. All payments are non-refundable except as expressly stated in your Service Plan. We reserve the right to change our prices and will notify you in advance of any such changes.

The Services, including the underlying AI models, software, algorithms, and all content on our Website (excluding your data), are the exclusive property of ElevAIte Labs AG and its licensors. These are protected by copyright, trademark, and other laws of Switzerland and foreign countries. Our trademarks may not be used in connection with any product or service without our prior written consent. You retain full ownership of the data you provide to the Service.

We may terminate or suspend your account and bar access to the Services immediately, without prior notice or liability, under our sole discretion, for any reason whatsoever, including but not limited to a breach of these Terms. If you wish to terminate your account, you may do so by providing written notice in accordance with your Service Plan. Upon termination, your right to use the Service will immediately cease.

The Services are provided on an "as is" and "as available" basis. You acknowledge that your use of the Services is at your sole risk and responsibility. To the fullest extent permitted by applicable law, we disclaim all warranties, express or implied, in connection with the Services and your use thereof, including, without limitation, the implied warranties of merchantability, fitness for a particular purpose, and non-infringement.
body.p2: We make no warranties or representations regarding the accuracy, completeness, timeliness, or usefulness of the content of the Services or any websites linked thereto. We shall not be liable for any (1) errors or omissions in any content and materials, (2) personal injury or property damage of any nature whatsoever resulting from your access to or use of the Services, or (3) any bugs, viruses, malware, or the like that may be transmitted to or through the Services by any third party. We do not guarantee any specific results from the use of our Services. Nothing herein shall affect any non-waivable statutory rights you may have or exclude or limit our liability where it would be unlawful to do so.

body.p1: To the maximum extent permitted by applicable law, in no event shall we, our directors, employees, or agents be liable to you or any third party for any direct, indirect, consequential, exemplary, incidental, special, or punitive damages, including but not limited to loss of profits, revenue, data, or other damages arising from the use or inability to use the Services, even if we have been advised of the possibility of such damages.
body.p2: Notwithstanding anything to the contrary herein and except as otherwise required by law, our total liability to you for any cause whatsoever and regardless of the form of the action will at all times be limited to the amount actually paid, if any, by you to us during the six (6) month period preceding the event giving rise to the claim. Some jurisdictions do not allow the exclusion or limitation of certain warranties or damages, so some of the above limitations may not apply to you. Nothing in this clause shall exclude or limit our liability for fraud, gross negligence, personal injury or death caused by our negligence, or any other liability that cannot be excluded or limited under applicable law.

body.p1: These Terms shall be governed and construed in accordance with the laws of Switzerland, without regard to its conflict of law provisions. Our failure to enforce any right or provision of these Terms will not be considered a waiver of those rights. If any provision of these Terms is held to be invalid or unenforceable by a court, the remaining provisions of these Terms will remain in effect.

introduction.heading: What are cookies and other tracking technologies?

body.p1: A cookie is a small data file that is placed on your device when you visit a website. Cookies are widely used to make websites work, or to work more efficiently, as well as to provide reporting information.
body.p2: This notice also applies to similar tracking technologies, like web beacons (sometimes called "tracking pixels" or "clear gifs"). These are tiny graphics files that contain a unique identifier that enable us to recognize when someone has visited our Website. This allows us, for example, to monitor the traffic patterns of users from one page within our Website to another and to understand whether you have come to our Website from an online advertisement displayed on a third-party website.

body.p1: We use first-party and third-party cookies for several reasons. Some cookies are required for technical reasons in order for our Website to operate, and we refer to these as "essential" or "strictly necessary" cookies. Other cookies enable us to provide a better experience on our Website, and others are used for analytics and marketing purposes. This is described in more detail below.
Our website uses the following categories of cookies, managed through our consent management platform, Cookiebot:
body.p2: These cookies are strictly necessary to provide you with services available through our Website and to use some of its features, such as remembering your consent preferences. Because these cookies are strictly necessary to deliver the Website to you, you cannot refuse them without impacting how our site functions.
body.necessary_li2_text: To store your consent status for other cookie categories for the current domain.
body.p3: These cookies collect information that is used in aggregate form to help us understand how our Website is being used or how effective our marketing campaigns are. This data helps us understand traffic patterns, which pages are most and least popular, and how visitors move around the site.
body.stats_li2_text: To collect anonymous data on user behavior, such as page views, session duration, and user demographics, to help us understand and optimize our website's performance. All data collected is aggregated and does not personally identify you.
body.p4: These cookies are used to make advertising messages more relevant to you. They perform functions like preventing the same ad from continuously reappearing, ensuring ads are properly displayed, and in some cases, selecting advertisements based on your interests. We may use this data to build a profile of your interests and show you relevant adverts on other sites.
body.marketing_li1_text: [List your marketing providers here, e.g., Meta (Facebook), LinkedIn, Google Ads]
body.marketing_li2_text: To track the effectiveness of marketing campaigns, enable targeted advertising, and understand user engagement with our marketing content.

body.p1: You have the right to decide whether to accept or reject cookies. You can exercise your cookie preferences at any time by clicking on the cookie settings link or banner provided by our consent management platform, Cookiebot. Through the banner, you can select which categories of cookies you accept or reject. Essential cookies cannot be rejected.
body.p2: In addition, you can set or amend your web browser controls to accept or refuse cookies. As the means by which you can refuse cookies through your web browser controls vary from browser-to-browser, you should visit your browser's help menu for more information.
body.p3_html: You can also opt out of targeted advertising by visiting industry portals such as the Digital Advertising Alliance (DAA) opt-out portal.

updates.heading: How often will we update this Cookie Notice?

body.p1: We may update this Cookie Notice from time to time in order to reflect, for example, changes to the cookies we use or for other operational, legal, or regulatory reasons. Please therefore re-visit this Cookie Notice regularly to stay informed about our use of cookies and related technologies. The date at the top of this Cookie Notice indicates when it was last updated.

contact.heading: Where can I get further information?

body.p1_text: If you have any questions about our use of cookies or other technologies, please email us at

hero.title: How We Transformed Goodnite's *Guest Experience* with a Complete AI Ecosystem
hero.subtitle: Strategic case study: Goodnite achieved 6x ROI in 12 months, increased guest satisfaction by 11%, and transformed their operations with a 24/7 AI guest experience ecosystem.

client.name: Goodnite
client.description: Premium vacation rental company in Brno, Czech Republic, offering 68 original rooms and suites across 12 buildings with contactless reception and maximum comfort focus.

challengeSection.title: The Challenge
challengeSection.subtitle: Goodnite faced critical operational challenges that limited their guest experience and growth potential in the competitive vacation rental market.

challenges.title: Limited Guest Support Hours
challenges.description: No availability for guest inquiries and support from 10 PM to 10 AM, leaving guests stranded during critical hours.

challenges.title: Inconsistent Communication
challenges.description: No standardized pre-arrival or post-stay communication process, leading to confusion and missed opportunities.

challenges.title: Low Review Generation
challenges.description: Only 40% of guests were leaving reviews, significantly impacting online visibility and booking conversions.

coreProblem.title: The Core Problem
coreProblem.quote: We needed a complete AI guest experience ecosystem that could provide 24/7 support, guide guests through their journey, and actively collect feedback to improve our ratings and bookings.

implementation.title: Strategic AI Implementation

features.description: AI-powered receptionist handling all guest inquiries from 10 PM to 10 AM with immediate response capability.

points: Manual meeting documentation consuming 2+ hours weekly
